## 4. Project Details

### 11_Rhinoceros_Music
- **Type:** Creative/Production hub
- **Tech:** Audio engineering, MIDI, hardware integration
- **Files:** 14 files in source repo
- **Missing Docs:** Signal flow, session templates, mixing guides

### 12_Rhinocrash
- **Type:** Development workflow, RhinoChat agents
- **Tech:** AI agents, chat interfaces
- **Files:** 52 files in source repo
- **Missing Docs:** API specs, agent architecture, deployment guide

### 13_Rhncrs_V1
- **Type:** Platform infrastructure, streaming system
- **Tech:** Streaming, real-time audio, platform backend
- **Files:** 14 files in source repo
- **Missing Docs:** Architecture diagrams, API documentation, deployment

### 14_Infrastructure
- **Type:** Server management for rhncrs.com
- **Tech:** Docker, deployment scripts, server config
- **Files:** 62 files in source repo
- **VPS:** 188.245.183.171
- **Missing Docs:** Runbooks, service documentation, monitoring setup

### 15_Infra_Swarm
- **Type:** Web UI for infrastructure management
- **Tech:** Frontend for infra monitoring/control
- **Files:** 31 files in source repo
- **Missing Docs:** User guide, API integration, feature roadmap
